text: Ben Bocquelet (born June 27, 1980) is a French-British animator, director, writer, and producer. He is best known for as the creator of The Amazing World of Gumball. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:British animators Category:British television directors Category:British television writers Category:British television producers Category:French animators Category:Writers from Paris Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Movie directors from Paris Category:French screenwriters Category:British screenwriters Category:British movie directors
title: Ben Bocquelet
